name: Lower Arch Station
description: On a nearby corner a violin sings; the cadence of its bow dancing in time with the rhythm of your thoughts.
You feel the weight of the bridges above you.
A bridge stretches away to the east.
There is a door at the end of the platform.

name: The Bridge of Sighs
description: You stand on the Bridge of Sighs. A wind blows from below, and it sings as it passes through the latticework of the bridge.
You feel the weight of the bridges above you.
The lower city gate is at the end of the bridge.
A bridge stretches away to the west.

name: A closed door
description: You stand in front of a closed door. It is made of some kind of hardwood. It looks sturdy.
It's also quite locked. You don't think you can open it.
Lower Arch Station is behind you.

name: Lower City Gate
description: "BEHOLD", shouts a guard, "the grand city of Villespont!".
You stand before the city gate.
Proceed into the city.
Venture out into the wilderness beyond the gate.

name: A gravel road
description: You are on a deserted gravel road.
It seems well-made and well-travelled.
A large city lies ahead.
Some spooky looking woods are to the south.

name: A dappled glade
description: You are in a well-forrested area. Ancient trees grow all around you.
Dappled light filters through the canopy above you. It is really quite pleasant here. You don't know why you thought the woods were spooky.
There is a small stream trickling by, near your feet.
A small path leads back out into daylight.
